description:
Capitalization is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter. Your task is to capitalize the given word.

Note, that during capitalization all the letters except the first one remains unchanged.
inputFormat: A single line contains a non-empty word. This word consists of lowercase and uppercase English letters. The length of the word will not exceed $ 10^{3} $ .
outputFormat: Output the given word after capitalization.
translation: 输入一个单词，将其首字母大写。
